title: Terms of Service
text:
# Terms of Service

_Last updated: **August 21, 2025**_

These Terms of Service ("**Terms**") govern your access to and use of the **React Interactive App** and related services (collectively, the "**Service**") provided by **React Interactive, Inc.** ("**Company**", "**we**", "**us**", or "**our**"). By accessing or using the Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree, do not use the Service.

---

## 1. Eligibility
- You may use the Service only if you are:
  1. At least the age of majority in your jurisdiction, and
  2. Legally capable of entering into a binding agreement.
- If you are accessing on behalf of an entity, you represent that you have authority to bind that entity, and "you" refers to that entity.

## 2. Accounts and Security
1. **Account Creation.** To use certain features, you must create an account and provide accurate and complete information.
2. **Account Security.** You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login credentials and for all activities under your account. Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use.
3. **Single User.** Accounts are personal and non-transferable. Do not share your credentials.

## 3. Acceptable Use
Prohibited conduct includes:
- Accessing or using the Service for any unlawful purpose
- Interfering with or disrupting the Service or servers
- Reverse engineering, decompiling, or attempting to derive source code (unless permitted by law)
- Uploading or transmitting malicious code, viruses, or harmful content
- Infringing or violating others' intellectual property, privacy, or other rights
- Using automated means (e.g., bots, scrapers) without prior written consent

## 4. User Content
1. **Ownership.** You retain ownership of content you submit, upload, or store through the Service ("**User Content**").
2. **License.** You grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to host, store, reproduce, and display your User Content solely as necessary to operate, improve, and provide the Service.
3. **Responsibility.** You represent that you have all rights necessary to grant the above license and that your content complies with these Terms and applicable law.

## 5. Intellectual Property
The Service (including content, design, and software) is owned by or licensed to the Company and protected by intellectual property laws. Except for the limited rights expressly granted, all rights are reserved.

## 6. Feedback
If you provide suggestions or ideas ("**Feedback**"), you grant us a perpetual, irrevocable, worldwide, royalty-free license to use it for any purpose without compensation.

## 7. Third-Party Services
The Service may contain links or integrations with third-party services. Use of third-party services is at your own risk and subject to their terms.

## 8. Privacy
Your use of the Service is subject to our [Privacy Policy](#).

## 9. Subscription, Fees, and Taxes (If Applicable)
Some features may require payment. Fees, billing cycles, and refund policies will be disclosed at purchase. You are responsible for taxes.

## 10. Suspension and Termination
1. **By Company.** We may suspend or terminate access at any time if you violate these Terms or to protect the Service or other users.
2. **By You.** You may stop using the Service at any time. Termination does not relieve obligations incurred before termination.

## 11. Disclaimers
THE SERVICE IS PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED.

## 12. Limitation of Liability
To the maximum extent permitted by law, we are not liable for indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages. Our aggregate liability shall not exceed the greater of $100 or the amount paid in the last 12 months.

## 13. Indemnification
You agree to indemnify and hold harmless the Company and its officers, directors, employees, and agents against claims, damages, and expenses arising from your use of the Service or violation of these Terms.

## 14. Governing Law; Dispute Resolution
These Terms are governed by the laws of _[Your State/Country]_. Disputes shall be resolved exclusively in the courts of _[Your City, State/Country]_.

## 15. Changes
We may update the Service and these Terms from time to time. We will notify you of material changes by posting updated Terms. Continued use constitutes acceptance.

## 16. Electronic Communications
By using the Service, you consent to receive communications electronically (emails, in-app messages, notices).

## 17. Severability and Waiver
If any provision is unenforceable, the rest remain effective. Our failure to enforce a right is not a waiver.

## 18. Contact
Questions? Email us at [support@example.com](mailto:support@example.com).
